Welcome!

I am a Visiting Assistant Professor at the [Quantitative Theory and Methods Department at Emory University](https://quantitative.emory.edu/index.html). Previously, I was a Visiting Assistant Professor at the [School of Global Policy and Strategy at UC San Diego,](https://gps.ucsd.edu/) an Assistant Professor in the [Political Science Department at the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), Brazil](https://www.ufpe.br/dcp), and the Principal Investigator of the [Computational and Experimental Political Science Lab (\@cpcex_lab)](https://cpcex-lab.rbind.io/en/). In 2017, I was awarded the Best Brazilian Ph.D. Dissertation Prize in Political Science and International Relations.

My academic work addresses Political Methodology, Data Science, Text as Data, Artificial Intelligence, and Comparative Politics.
